column2: I met up with a couple of friends for dinner. I walked in through the hallway and I instantly fell in love with the atmosphere. Big legs of serrano ham hang from the ceiling next to the bar and the open kitchen. It's a pretty amazing sight. Then we had the sangria
column3: paella and a couple of tapas. The waitress must have told the manager we are new to this place because he came up to us and introduced himself. Oh
column5: he brought us three kinds of desserts ON THE HOUSE. Ahh
